page.title: 15LEISURE IN THE AREA
page.content: In the Huntingdon, Brampton area there are not many public leisure facilities.There is only the Brampton {Racecourse, Hinchingbrooke House}and {park.}People can,and often do create their own means of leisure. {Television}is one of the most widely used means of private leisure.All ages watch it but children and old people more so than working people. Also a {cinema}has opened in Huntingdon. Hinchingbrooke House and park have a few facilities.The park is a picnic area and used for{walking.}Guided tours of the House are given by the Curator. Also in the grounds is an indoor heated{swimming-pool.}Membership costs Â£18.00 per annum.
